snippet: The U.S. Department of Agriculture has approved commercial planting of a potato that is genetically modified to resist bruising and to produce less of a chemical that has caused cancer in animals....

headline.print_headline: USDA Approves GMO Potato Designed by Simplot
headline.main: USDA Approves GMO Potato Designed by Simplot

lead_paragraph: The U.S. Department of Agriculture has approved commercial planting of a potato that is genetically modified to resist bruising and to produce less of a chemical that has caused cancer in animals.
